nodes.title: Fix ion null deserialization

Fix README Typo
Support base64 strings in `getBinaryValue()` for CBOR and Smile
[Avro] Add `logicalType` support for some `java.time` types; add `AvroJavaTimeModule` for native ser/deser

[Avro] Basic logicalType support for date time types
Allow disabling native type ids when deserializing for #270
Add OSS-Fuzz badge
Resolve merge conflict in code snippet

Add support for generating IonSexps

Reference to #149 in CBORParser should be #124
Add support for simple values with no content for Major Type 7
Refactoring - Deleted Unnecessary conversion to String and Deleted Redundant Interface Modifier
Add `CBORGenerator.Feature.LENIENT_UTF_ENCODING` for lenient handling of Unicode surrogate pairs on writing
implement property and optionalProperty(String, JsonFormatVisitable, JavaType) methods
Cache record names to avoid hitting class loader
Fix serialization of Avro null values
Optimize IonParser.getNumberType() and Ion decimals as BigDecimal to support arbitraty precision

add descriptor loader
